physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Baseline laboratory work revealed normal complete blood cell count and differential, normal urate level.
Rifampin-pyrazinamide therapy was stopped; patient was asymptomatic.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: AST level: 1757 U/L, Total bilirubin level: 63 mmol/L, Prothrombin time: 1.3
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient began complaining of fatigue, nausea, and myalgias.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening of symptoms and liver enzyme levels.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: AST level: 2243 U/L, Total bilirubin level: 159 mmol/L, Prothrombin time: 1.6
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued worsening of liver enzyme levels.
Patient's condition progressed to liver failure prior to transplantation.
